ComicInfo.Summary:
Deciding to return the Elven Fire to the elves, our elven friends are on the run from the Dark Army. Camping at night they are awakened by a ROARGH!. They bust out of the tent to find a large skeletal monster tromping through the forrest. Discussing whether the monster was after them it attacked. The found that their blade simple busted againt it except for Luse's magical blade but he doesn't know how to use it. Luse grabs the fire and runs and comes up with a plan with sketches and everything that would make Jay and Silent Bob envious. The plan doesn't work and while fleeing across a bridge it falls and Luse and the monster with it. Luse out of desperation smacked the monster with the flame catching it on fire. The beast burned as Luse wondered why Cleah got such a stupid haircut.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/poison-elves-51-nemisis/4000-175433/
ComicInfo.Title: Nemisis
